nodes.text: Lady Alya Aldrete was an Alderaanian noblewoman of the Aldrete family who ran a Deep Core smuggling ring following the Clone Wars. She was responsible for getting a group of freedom fighters from Alderaan to Prakith to rescue Denia. She was key in the Sarlacc Project, in which she donated her maps and money, in the name of the Rebel Alliance. Lady Alya was of unknown relation to Celana Aldrete and Agrippa Aldrete.
